org.eclipse.jgit.gitrepo

クラス RepoCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jgit.api.GitCommand<RevCommit>
      • org.eclipse.jgit.gitrepo.RepoCommand
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    Callable<RevCommit>

    public class RepoCommand
extends GitCommand<RevCommit>
    A class used to execute a repo command. This will parse a repo XML manifest, convert it into .gitmodules file and the repository config file. If called against a bare repository, it will replace all the existing content of the repository with the contents populated from the manifest. repo manifest allows projects overlapping, e.g. one project's path is "foo" and another project's path is "foo/bar". This won't work in git submodule, so we'll skip all the sub projects ("foo/bar" in the example) while converting.
    導入されたバージョン:
    3.4
    関連項目:
    git-repo project page

      • setPath

        public RepoCommand setPath(String path)
        Set path to the manifest XML file.

        Calling setInputStream(java.io.InputStream) will ignore the path set here.

        パラメータ:
        path - (with / as separator)
        戻り値:
        this command

      • setInputStream

        public RepoCommand setInputStream(InputStream inputStream)
        Set the input stream to the manifest XML.

        Setting inputStream will ignore the path set. It will be closed in call().

        パラメータ:
        inputStream -
        戻り値:
        this command
        導入されたバージョン:

      • setGroups

        public RepoCommand setGroups(String groups)
        Set groups to sync
        パラメータ:
        groups - groups separated by comma, examples: default|all|G1,-G2,-G3
        戻り値:
        this command

      • setBranch

        public RepoCommand setBranch(String branch)
        Set default branch.

        This is generally the name of the branch the manifest file was in. If there's no default revision (branch) specified in manifest and no revision specified in project, this branch will be used.

        パラメータ:
        branch -
        戻り値:
        this command

      • setTargetBranch

        public RepoCommand setTargetBranch(String branch)
        Set target branch.

        This is the target branch of the super project to be updated. If not set, default is HEAD.

        For non-bare repositories, HEAD will always be used and this will be ignored.

        パラメータ:
        branch -
        戻り値:
        this command
        導入されたバージョン:
        4.1

      • setRecordRemoteBranch

        public RepoCommand setRecordRemoteBranch(boolean enable)
        Set whether the branch name should be recorded in .gitmodules.

        Submodule entries in .gitmodules can include a "branch" field to indicate what remote branch each submodule tracks.

        That field is used by "git submodule update --remote" to update to the tip of the tracked branch when asked and by Gerrit to update the superproject when a change on that branch is merged.

        Subprojects that request a specific commit or tag will not have a branch name recorded.

        Not implemented for non-bare repositories.

        パラメータ:
        enable - Whether to record the branch name
        戻り値:
        this command
        導入されたバージョン:
        4.2

      • setRecordSubmoduleLabels

        public RepoCommand setRecordSubmoduleLabels(boolean enable)
        Set whether the labels field should be recorded as a label in .gitattributes.

        Not implemented for non-bare repositories.

        パラメータ:
        enable - Whether to record the labels in the .gitattributes
        戻り値:
        this command
        導入されたバージョン:
        4.4

      • setRecommendShallow

        public RepoCommand setRecommendShallow(boolean enable)
        Set whether the clone-depth field should be recorded as a shallow recommendation in .gitmodules.

        Not implemented for non-bare repositories.

        パラメータ:
        enable - Whether to record the shallow recommendation.
        戻り値:
        this command
        導入されたバージョン:
        4.4

      • setProgressMonitor

        public RepoCommand setProgressMonitor(ProgressMonitor monitor)
        The progress monitor associated with the clone operation. By default, this is set to NullProgressMonitor
        パラメータ:
        monitor -
        戻り値:
        this command
        関連項目:
        NullProgressMonitor

      • setIgnoreRemoteFailures

        public RepoCommand setIgnoreRemoteFailures(boolean ignore)
        Set whether to skip projects whose commits don't exist remotely.

        When set to true, we'll just skip the manifest entry and continue on to the next one.

        When set to false (default), we'll throw an error when remote failures occur.

        Not implemented for non-bare repositories.

        パラメータ:
        ignore - Whether to ignore the remote failures.
        戻り値:
        this command
        導入されたバージョン:
        4.3

      • setAuthor

        public RepoCommand setAuthor(PersonIdent author)
        Set the author/committer for the bare repository commit.

        For non-bare repositories, the current user will be used and this will be ignored.

        パラメータ:
        author -
        戻り値:
        this command

      • setRemoteReader

        public RepoCommand setRemoteReader(RepoCommand.RemoteReader callback)
        Set the GetHeadFromUri callback. This is only used in bare repositories.
        パラメータ:
        callback -
        戻り値:
        this command
